channel.title: Ok I am new to this (as presumibly you once where), need help with
channel.description:
First off Ill say what I know/have [ul][li]java programming language[/li] [li]what a rsps is[/li] [li]a no-ip account[/li] [li]packet data[/li] [li]server and client[/li] [li]basic understanding of the server works[/li][/ul]
Also when i try to open the world map it says can not access worldmap.jar, does any 1 know where i can get a map jar file?
What I want to know is [ul][li]external tools?[/li] [li]general setup information[/li] [li]code locations (not necessary)[class/java file for...][/li] [li]detailed instructions/tuts for things such as adding and deleting npc's and objects[/li][/ul]
if anyone has any helpful information, please post it. Thanks :)

item.title: Ok I am new to this (as presumibly you once where), need help with
item.dc:creator: @gray561 gray561
item.description:
@gray561 wrote:

For A source i suggest ags pking source. it has very good combat for delta and things are easily changable such as the bacckround of the client, it is located right were you can see it and you just need to rightclick>edit to change. its quite a nice starting source imo.

Read full topic
item.source: Ok I am new to this (as presumibly you once where), need help with

item.title: Ok I am new to this (as presumibly you once where), need help with
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

I would suggest, instead of waiting for the information to come to you (because it probably won’t), look up tutorials and information on the multiple private server forums.

People release tutorials for others to come across, so you have to really do some research.

Read full topic

item.title: Ok I am new to this (as presumibly you once where), need help with
item.dc:creator: @fvbno fvbno
item.description:
@fvbno wrote:

xmonster:

u need jdk to compile

Thats not what i meant i worded it wrong i meant to say where do the classes go but i found out. {thanks to coderalex [a friend of mine]}

Read full topic
item.source: Ok I am new to this (as presumibly you once where), need help with

item.title: Ok I am new to this (as presumibly you once where), need help with
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

if you find a simple source, read all the tutorials you can for adding stuff to them. you don’t necessarily have to DO the tutorial, but it will help you get a better understanding of how a private server runs. data sent from the client to your server uses packets. these let the server know what your client[user] is trying to accomplish. such as trading,training,walking,rearranging, messaging, ETC.

i personally used a pimpscape source as my first one XD but that is VERYYY old school now…

Read full topic
